EmailTemplate.description: Use this template to email a client when no response is received re: a tech support issue
EmailTemplate.name: Support No Response
EmailTemplate.subject: Techical Support Assistance - Please Reply
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
We have tried calling you concerning your call into technical support on [ENTER DATE]. Do you still need assistance?
If so, please call or fax us and let us know.
I will close this ticket if we do not get a response back by the end of today.
TriTech EMS Support Team emssupport@tritech.com Phone: 563-387-9338 Fax: 563-387-9335
